snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio of New York, who was managed Hillary Rodham Clinton’s 2000 United States Senate campaign, declined to endorse Mrs. Clinton on Sunday.
abstract: Mayor Bill de Blasio of New York, who was managed Hillary Rodham Clinton’s 2000 United States Senate campaign, declined to endorse Mrs. Clinton on Sunday.

headline.main: No Hillary Clinton Endorsement Just Yet From Bill de Blasio
